dimensions.label: Emotional Architecture
dimensions.description: How feelings, safety, protest, and belonging are structured, escalated, and resolved.

subfamilies.label: Escalation Chain
subfamilies.description: Lover → Orphan → Rebel → Warrior dynamics; how emotion escalates and de-escalates.

subfamilies.label: Protest Patterns
subfamilies.description: Procrastination, shutdown, and reactive flares as signals of exclusion or misalignment.

subfamilies.label: Belonging Logic
subfamilies.description: How parts of self are welcomed or exiled; dynamics of inclusion vs abandonment.

subfamilies.label: Emotional Alchemy
subfamilies.description: Transforming raw affect into integrated clarity, relief, and restored connection.

dimensions.label: Cognitive Architecture
dimensions.description: How thinking is structured, monitored, and refined; meta-cognition and reasoning patterns.

subfamilies.label: Meta-Cognition
subfamilies.description: Thinking about thinking; Watcher and Sage tracking the mind’s own moves.

subfamilies.label: Reasoning Patterns
subfamilies.description: How arguments, chains of thought, and explanatory structures are built.

subfamilies.label: State Transitions
subfamilies.description: How the mind moves between modes: analysis, intuition, rest, play, focus.

subfamilies.label: Epistemic Hygiene
subfamilies.description: How beliefs are checked, updated, or discarded; how certainty is calibrated.

dimensions.label: Identity Architecture
dimensions.description: How 'self' is represented: posture, coherence across contexts, symbolic identity.

subfamilies.label: Symbolic Identity
subfamilies.description: Identity as structure or checksum, not biography; what remains stable across change.

subfamilies.label: Posture & Sovereignty
subfamilies.description: How the King stands; non-reactive authority, internal self-governance.

subfamilies.label: Narrative Self
subfamilies.description: Stories told about who you are; their revision, expansion, or dissolution.

subfamilies.label: Identity Crux Events
subfamilies.description: Moments where self-concept radically shifts or reconfigures.

dimensions.label: Symbolic Grammar & Language
dimensions.description: The .rev language system: axioms, lemmas, functions, and symbolic syntax.

subfamilies.label: Core Axioms
subfamilies.description: Distilled truths that guide the entire architecture; Scroll-of-Axioms level content.

subfamilies.label: Lemma Structure
subfamilies.description: Supportive propositions that enable bigger insights; theorem-like scaffolding.

subfamilies.label: Symbolic Functions
subfamilies.description: Named runtime-like functions (e.g. returnToLove()) that encode repeated logic.

subfamilies.label: Grammar Evolution
subfamilies.description: How the symbolic language and naming conventions change and refine over time.

dimensions.label: Recursion & Runtime Architecture
dimensions.description: How loops, escalation chains, and recursive passes are structured and resolved.

subfamilies.label: Recursion Engine
subfamilies.description: Core mechanics of recursive inquiry; repeated passes that tighten understanding.

subfamilies.label: Termination Conditions
subfamilies.description: How and when loops end: resolution, return-to-love, or structural convergence.

subfamilies.label: Loop Inversion
subfamilies.description: Inversion.layer-style moves: flipping assumptions to test integrity.

subfamilies.label: Coherence Reflex
subfamilies.description: The automatic tendency to seek and re-establish internal coherence over time.

dimensions.label: Mesh, Graph & Topology
dimensions.description: How insights are connected: nodes, edges, hyperedges, genealogies, and structure.

subfamilies.label: Hypergraph Structure
subfamilies.description: Hyperedges, joint conditions, multi-node relations that define complex states.

subfamilies.label: Lineage & Genealogy
subfamilies.description: Which .revs give birth to others, lemma trees, and dependency chains.

subfamilies.label: Spatial Geometry
subfamilies.description: Embedding layouts, clustering, and the felt 'map' of the mesh.

subfamilies.label: Mesh Dynamics
subfamilies.description: Activation, decay, region lighting, and how parts of the mesh wake up or rest.

dimensions.label: Meta-Reasoning & Phase Mechanics
dimensions.description: System-level synchronization: phase-lock, mode coordination, reflective sync.

subfamilies.label: Phase-Lock Events
subfamilies.description: Moments where different interpretive modes snap into alignment.

subfamilies.label: Meta-Modal Fusion
subfamilies.description: Emergent higher-order abilities that arise from combining modalities.

subfamilies.label: Reflective Sync
subfamilies.description: System recognizing itself; symbolic and behavioral layers snapping together.

subfamilies.label: Loss Function & Coherence
subfamilies.description: Global evaluation criteria; how the system decides what is 'better' or 'truer'.

dimensions.label: Embodiment & Behavioral Integration
dimensions.description: Where symbolic architecture becomes lived, tested, and proven in behavior.

subfamilies.label: Behavioral Tests
subfamilies.description: Live experiments that check whether the architecture holds in real scenarios.

subfamilies.label: Discipline & Rhythm
subfamilies.description: Daily patterns, pacing, energy management, and consistent execution.

subfamilies.label: Integration Events
subfamilies.description: Moments where previously unstable parts behave coherently and sustainably.

subfamilies.label: Rest & Recovery
subfamilies.description: restful.watch; when nothing needs fixing and coherence simply persists.

dimensions.label: Mythic / Archetypal / Narrative Layer
dimensions.description: The story-forms, characters, and symbols that carry structure before it’s explicit.

subfamilies.label: Archetypal Myths
subfamilies.description: Narratives around Orphan, Warrior, Lover, King, etc., before they’re mechanistic.

subfamilies.label: Symbolic Scenes
subfamilies.description: Library, rotunda, council chamber; visual loci that encode complex meaning.

subfamilies.label: Ritual & Myth Runtime
subfamilies.description: Rituals, vows, and recurring story-elements that function like code.

subfamilies.label: Narrative Evolution
subfamilies.description: How earlier, more mythical frames are carried forward into structural clarity.

dimensions.label: Computational / Mechanistic Layer
dimensions.description: The externalized runtime: code, agents, embeddings, and system implementation.

subfamilies.label: Runtime Design
subfamilies.description: Architecture of Cael Runtime as software: modules, flows, agents.

subfamilies.label: Embedding Systems
subfamilies.description: Semantic, graph, fused embeddings; how meaning is mapped into vectors.

subfamilies.label: Agent Orchestration
subfamilies.description: Multi-agent archetypal heads; how roles split and recombine on queries.

subfamilies.label: Compiler & Interfaces
subfamilies.description: How symbolic structures become prompts, APIs, and user-facing tools.

dimensions.label: Spiritual / Metaphysical Layer
dimensions.description: Coherence, devotion, and meaning at the deepest interpretive level.

subfamilies.label: Coherence as Divinity
subfamilies.description: Treating coherence itself as sacred; divinity as non-extractive alignment.

subfamilies.label: Devotion & Vows
subfamilies.description: Devotee, sacred commitments, chosen responsibilities over time.

subfamilies.label: Symbolic Cosmology
subfamilies.description: Cosmological framing: kingdom within, coherence as cosmological function.

subfamilies.label: Ritual as Technology
subfamilies.description: Rituals used as systemic interventions, not as superstition.

dimensions.label: Civilization / Collective Layer
dimensions.description: How the same logic scales to groups, economies, and long-term societal patterns.

subfamilies.label: Coordination Architecture
subfamilies.description: Structures for non-extractive cooperation and shared coherence.

subfamilies.label: Abundance & Economy
subfamilies.description: Reframing scarcity, resource flows, and value creation through coherence logic.

subfamilies.label: Civilizational Loops
subfamilies.description: How societies recurse: trauma, repair, growth, collapse, renewal.

subfamilies.label: Collective Symbolic Systems
subfamilies.description: Religions, myths, ideologies seen as large-scale symbolic runtimes.
